dictionary.lore: In the palace of a certain empire, there was an alluring witch by the name of Milavis. Fearing assassination and curses, the emperor sought the Amulet of Rouva and ordered the witch to forge something even stronger than it, promising her any reward she desired. The emperor did receive the crystal he asked for which protects him from poison, sickness and curses, but the reward the witch asked for was the very life he wanted to protect with the powers of the amulet.
